name: Hat Maker (Dumpling Cloud)
description:
Hat Maker is a choose your own adventure game where you play the role of an ordinary hat maker.

Your goal is to make enough money from selling hats to buy bread. If you are adventurous enough, maybe you'll discover the hidden pathways! (note: game works best when played fullscreen)

Try to unlock the:

- Old Man's House

- Amory

- Santamont

- Jezul's Great Circus Lifetime Ticket

- Parrot

Have fun!
